MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH22 postcode area of Mayfield. Following a number of recent power cuts our team have replaced blown fuses caused by an underground cable fault outside 32 Blackcot Road. We had temporarily restored supplies however in order to carry out further excavations safely, our team need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:00pm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:48pm on Monday 2nd November 2020
